mapper.select:
select t.sourcecode dataSourceCode, t.sourcedesc dataSourceDescription, t.bigaggrecode bProtocolCode, t.bigaggredesc bProtocolDescription, t.smallaggrecode sProtocolCode, t.smallaggredesc sProtocolDescription, t.actiontype actionType, sum(t.input_count) inputDataNum, floor(avg(t.inputfieldfillrage)) inputFieldFillRate, floor(avg(t.inputrelyfieldfillrage)) inputDependGroupFillRate, floor(avg(t.inputfielduserage)) inputFieldAvailability, floor(avg(t.inputrelyfielduserage)) inputDependGroupAvailability, floor(avg(t.inputaccuracyrage)) inputDataAccuracy, floor(sum(t.output_count)) outputNum, floor(avg(t.outputspeed)) outputDataSpeed, floor(avg(t.outputfieldfillrage)) outputFieldFillRate, floor(avg(t.outputrelyfieldfillrage)) outputDependGroupFillRate from ycl_quality t
group by t.sourcecode, t.bigaggrecode, t.smallaggrecode, t.actiontype limit #{start},#{length}
SELECT count( DISTINCT t.sourcecode, t.bigaggrecode, t.smallaggrecode, t.actiontype ) FROM ycl_quality t
select createDate as colKey,${colName} as colValue from ycl_quality
